General.Name: PT Century Textile Industry Tbk
General.Description: PT Century Textile Industry Tbk engages in the textile business in Indonesia and internationally. The company provides spinning, weaving, and dyeing and finishing of cloths. It also offers tetoron cotton and chief value cotton plain and dobby fabrics, as well as oxford fabrics for producing shirts and uniforms. PT Century Textile Industry Tbk was founded in 1970 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Raya Bogor Km. 27, Jakarta Timur, Indonesia, 13740

2.Name: Bertha Marita Manik
